_header: Almighty Lord in Trinity / One God and persons three
Note: The end of 4970 appearing separately; apparently based on the ‘Southern Resurrection’ — see 1546.

BLLan388.First Lines:
All myghty lord in TrenyteO god an persones
                    thre…
BLLan388.Last Lines:
…To his seruantis & graunt here boneMy leue frendis
                    þat þis boke heres
BLLan388.Note:
Ends imperfectly. Folio number reflects the most recent
                    foliation.
